alert.note: Alert for Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 25 at 11:01AM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE SUNDAY NIGHT ABOVE 8500 FEET... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible above 8500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Uncompahgre Plateau and Dallas Divide. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 AM MST this morning. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late tonight through late Sunday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
